name: Kobold
description: Kobolds are small, reptilian humanoids with features that blend lizard-like and canine traits. Once blessed the monumental task of rearing drakes in the Age of Dragons, kobolds have since abandoned that lineage, instead building sprawling cities throughout the tunnels of Kragfel that have yet to be mapped. Kobolds are known for their exceptionally short lives and large families, resulting in a culture that values initiative over playing it safe.

options.name: Short Lived, Trained Early
options.description: Kobolds are fragile creatures and start training within the first few years of their lives. Gain +1 Attack to all Attacks but suffer a -5 Health penalty.

options.name: Reaction : Play Dead
options.description: In response to taking Damage, you fall Prone and convincingly play dead. A Creature cannot deduce that you are alive unless making a Contested Insight Check against your Performance.
